data.title: Amazon Location Service
data.meta_description: Amazon Location Service is a location-based service that lets developers add location functionality, such as maps, points of interest, geocoding, routing, tracking, and geofencing, to their applications.
data.text:
Easily integrate geospatial data into your applications for different use cases or geographies with data from multiple providers.

Understand current and historical locations of your products and fleet of vehicles to route shipments and optimize dispatch efficiency.

Learn more about asset tracking »

Examine location data on a map to visualize assets, or combine multiple data sources to identify patterns and relationships to accelerate business decisions.

Learn more about adding a map to your webpage »

Complete address entries quicker, and use geocoding and reverse geocoding to enrich and standardize customer addresses.

Learn more about database enrichment »

Accelerate deliveries and reduce fuel consumption using travel time, distance, and directions between a departure point and one or more destinations.

Learn more about delivery applications »

Explore the interactive map. Search points of interest, simulate tracking devices, draw geofences, and more.

Add maps, location awareness, and other location-based features to your mobile app.
